itemDesc: An automatic assault rifle fitted with a high-capacity drum magazine, designed for sustained rapid fire.
A bolt-action repeater rifle known for its reliability and stopping power.
A semi-automatic rifle designed for accurate mid-range infantry engagements.
A compact carbine offering balanced handling and mobility for frontline infantry.
A reliable sidearm with strong stopping power, effective in close combat.
The primary service rifle of the Colonial Legion, offering improved fire rate and handling over earlier designs.
An automatic rifle optimized for sustained suppressive fire against advancing enemies.
A burst-fire rifle that fires three rounds in rapid succession for effective suppression.
A compact submachine gun designed for aggressive close-quarters combat.
A designated marksman rifle offering precision fire at long range.
A powerful close-range automatic weapon built for urban and trench warfare.
A compact submachine gun optimized for trench clearing and rapid assaults.
A versatile storm rifle featuring multiple fire modes, effective at close to mid-range combat.
A high-impact three-round burst storm rifle designed for aggressive engagements.
A powerful revolver-style sidearm with high stopping power at short range.
A high-powered long rifle designed for mid-to-long range infantry combat.
A compact semi-automatic pistol used as a standard Warden sidearm.
A lightweight burst-fire sidearm optimized for close-quarters engagements.
A lightweight carbine with a high rate of fire, ideal for mobile infantry units.
A bolt-action rifle designed for accuracy and reliability at long range.
A scoped rifle variant optimized for marksman and overwatch roles.
An automatic rifle providing sustained fire capability for frontline infantry.
A close-range shotgun designed for trench and urban combat.
A long-range marksman rifle equipped with a scope for precision support fire.
A compact submachine gun with a high rate of fire for close-quarters combat.
A rapid-fire submachine gun optimized for aggressive close-range engagements.
